description:
# clikit

clikit is a group of utilities to build beautiful and testable command line interfaces.

this is at the core of [cleo](https://github.com/sdispater/cleo).
name: clikit
requires_dist: typing (>=3.6,<4.0); python_version >= "2.7" and python_version < "2.8" or python_version >= "3.4" and python_version < "3.5"
summary: clikit is a group of utilities to build beautiful and testable command line interfaces.
kwds:
packaging,dependency,poetry # clikit

clikit is a group of utilities to build beautiful and testable command line interfaces.

this is at the core of [cleo](https://github.com/sdispater/cleo). clikit is a group of utilities to build beautiful and testable command line interfaces.
